title: Set up screenshot and wallpaper tools
description: Configure grim + slurp for screenshots (area selection, full screen). Set up swaybg or wpaperd for wallpaper. Add wl-clipboard integration (already installed). Add keybindings: Print for full screenshot, Shift+Print for area selection.

title: Remove old GNOME configuration
description: After niri is validated on both machines, remove or archive gnome.nix. Clean up GNOME-specific packages (gnome-disks, gnome-sushi, libgtop, gnome-themes-extra), GDM config, dconf settings, GNOME extensions. Keep any utilities that are still needed (nautilus can work standalone).

title: Handle NVIDIA compatibility for niri on alligator
description: Ensure niri works with NVIDIA GPU on alligator. May need: environment variables (WLR_NO_HARDWARE_CURSORS, GBM_BACKEND, etc.), proper EGL/GBM setup, xwayland-satellite for X11 apps. Test hardware acceleration, multi-monitor, and gaming (gamescope) compatibility.
close_reason: Not needed - no NVIDIA GPU in use

title: Test niri setup on alligator and hamster
description: Full integration testing on both machines. Verify: compositor starts, keybindings work, all desktop apps launch, multi-monitor (alligator), touchpad (hamster), battery indicator (hamster), audio, clipboard, file manager (nautilus), screenshots, lock screen, auto-login, XDG portals (Firefox file dialogs), systray apps.

title: Configure display manager for niri session
description: Either configure GDM to offer niri as a session option, or switch to greetd+tuigreet/regreet for a lighter login manager. Keep auto-login for alex. Ensure niri session starts with proper environment (dbus, XDG portals, etc.).

title: Set up app launcher and notification daemon
description: Configure fuzzel (or tofi/wofi) as app launcher bound to Super+D or similar. Configure mako (or dunst) as notification daemon to replace GNOME notifications. Ensure gsconnect/KDE Connect notifications still work.

title: Port logind power settings for hamster
description: In machines/hamster/default.nix:36-40, logind power/lid settings are commented out with 'TODO: port'. Need to configure HandlePowerKey, HandleLidSwitch, HandleLidSwitchExternalPower for the hamster laptop.

title: Add container/podman monitoring
description: In roles/core/podman.nix:26 there's a TODO for monitoring. Set up monitoring for Podman containers (resource usage, health checks, alerting). Consider Prometheus + cAdvisor or similar.

title: Set up screen locker and idle management
description: Configure swaylock (or swaylock-effects) as screen locker with Super+L binding. Set up swayidle for automatic screen lock after timeout and DPMS (screen off). Replace GNOME's built-in lock screen and power management.

title: Set up waybar status bar for niri
description: Configure waybar as the status bar for niri. Replace GNOME panel + astra-monitor extension functionality. Include: workspaces, clock with seconds, battery (hamster), network status, audio/volume, system tray (for appindicator replacements), CPU/RAM/disk monitors. Style to match dark theme.

title: Re-enable broken packages (devcontainer, mcp-nixos, gqrx, jetbrains-mono, ncmpcpp)
description:
Several packages are commented out with 'TODO: re-add once fixed'. Check if upstream issues are resolved and re-enable:
- devcontainer in roles/dev/default.nix:63
- mcp-nixos in roles/dev/opencode.nix:65
- gqrx in profiles/sdr.nix:7
- jetbrains-mono in profiles/fonts.nix:7
- ncmpcpp in profiles/music.nix:19

For each: try uncommenting and building. If it builds, re-enable. If not, check upstream for status.

title: Configure GTK/Qt theming without GNOME
description: Set up GTK theme (Adwaita-dark), icon theme (Adwaita), cursor theme (Bibata-Modern-Classic 16px), Qt theme (adwaita-dark) without relying on GNOME settings daemon. Use nwg-look, gsettings, or home-manager gtk/qt options. Ensure consistent theming across GTK3, GTK4, and Qt apps.

title: Create base niri compositor config
description: Create roles/desktop/niri.nix with core niri configuration: scrollable-tiling layout, 9 workspaces, window rules, input settings (touchpad tap-to-click, keyboard US+RU with CapsLock toggle), focus/movement keybindings (Super+WASD or similar), workspace switching (Super+1-9, Super+Shift+1-9 to move), Super+Q close, Super+Return terminal, Super+F fullscreen. Port relevant settings from current gnome.nix.

title: Switch desktop from GNOME to niri
description: Epic: Migrate desktop environment from GNOME to niri scrollable-tiling Wayland compositor. Niri is in nixpkgs and has niri-flake (sodiboo/niri-flake) with NixOS + home-manager modules. Current setup: GNOME with GDM, 5 extensions (blur-my-shell, astra-monitor, caffeine, gsconnect, appindicator), 9 static workspaces, custom keybindings. Machines: alligator (NVIDIA desktop), hamster (ThinkBook laptop).

title: Add niri-flake input to flake.nix
description: Add sodiboo/niri-flake as a flake input and wire up its NixOS + home-manager modules. This provides niri packages (stable/unstable), NixOS module (polkit, dconf, opengl, fonts), and home-manager module for declarative config with build-time validation. Binary cache at niri.cachix.org.
